title: #296 - Daniel Dennett Christmas Spectacular
itunes:title: #296 - Daniel Dennett Christmas Spectacular
description: Ho, ho, ho! Etc, etc. On this special (decidedly Christian) holiday, Connor and Dan decide to spend some time with one of the Four Horsemen of New Atheism. But they pick the one who happens to look like Santa Claus so it's all good. Regardless, it's time to talk science and religion all at once! Happy Holidays!
